A1: southwest London services to and from
RelatedSentence: Passengers have been warned of train delays this morning after late - running engineering works disrupted southwest London services to and from London Victoria and London Bridge .

A1: delays , alterations and cancellations on routes to Balham ,
RelatedSentence: Passengers on Southern Railway were told to expect delays , alterations and cancellations on routes to Balham , Clapham Junction , Croydon , Crystal Palace , Mitcham and Sutton .
One passenger waiting at West Croydon said : We 've been told to expect delays of up to 20 minutes , but not much more than that .
